title: Giving Prince's New Albums A Spin
teaser: Prince released two new albums this week after a four year hiatus.
contentencoded:
It’s been four years since Prince released his last studio album, “20Ten.”

But this week, his rewarded his fans’ patience with not one, but two releases: “Art Official Age” and “Plectrum Electrum,” his collaborative effort with his backup band 3rdEyeGirl.

Here & Now‘s pop culture critic Renee Graham joins Robin Young for a listen of both albums.

  • WBUR’s The Artery: With 2 New CDs, He’s Still Every Inch A Prince

Guest

  • Renee Graham, pop culture critic for Here & Now. She tweets @reneeygraham.
